name: Curse of Nature
description:
Curse of Nature is a casual, prototyped game of the misfortunes of a young mandrake who looses its home as it grows up. Cast into the dark depths of an old well, fight to avoid the walls and stone as you fall deeper into the abyss of a new and unfamiliar environment.

Discover new and unusual biomes as you fall deeper into the well and you might just find the reason why you were cast out and where other mandrakes have also disappeared.

Made under Studio Kaboom, Australia.

Executive Producers: Joel Bennet & Henry Sun

Game Designer: Stephanie Harris

Programming: Felix Skrandies & Rain Jacob

2D Artist: Rain Jacob

3D Artist: Máttyás Korhecz
